sentence: Now, the former president is currently supporting his former White House aide Max Miller in a House campaign even though Miller’s ex-girlfriend, fellow former White House staffer Stephanie Grisham, accused him of physically and emotionally abusing her.
author: Cameron Joseph
title: Trump endorsed a congressional candidate accused of abusing her stepdaughter.

sentence: The six-term congressman from Amish Country exits a primary race in northeast Ohio that, under new temporary maps, would have put him up against Trump-backed Republican Max Miller.
